Summary: four bright orbs of light spinning around an even brighter light that was in the center they would go around the center light and then all four lights would go into the center light and break away repeating the same patteren over and over again.
divs: Sighting DetailsI live in Essington pa about a mile or two from Philadelphia i was just getting home from work i guess a little after 1am as i exited my vehicle in front of my house i noticed four bright orbs of light spinning around an even brighter light that was in the center they would go around the center light and then all four lights would go into the center light and break away repeating the same patteren over and over again. i ran into the house woke up my step son and we went back out front and tried to record it and take a few pictures do to the bright street lights and the lights of the near by city of philadelphia we were unable to get any pictures or footage of the lights. what ever it was it was huge it was an over cast night and the lights were above the cloud cover i would estamate it being 400 to 600 feet in diameter
trends: There have been no other sightings in Tinicum Township
This sighting has never been favorited.
